title: Citi Taiwan Extends Partnership with Vieshow Cinemas to Launch Electronic Ticketing Service
summary: To further meet client demand for increased efficiency and convenience, Citibank Taiwan has extended its partnership with Vieshow Cinemas to offer a new paperless or QR code ticketing service. With the new service, clients who book tickets using Citi credit cards on their smartphones will be able to enter cinema halls directly, without having to queue up to collect their movie tickets.
tag-1: Citi Taiwan Extends Partnership with Vieshow Cinemas to Launch Electronic Ticketing Service
tag-2: To further meet client demand for increased efficiency and convenience, Citibank Taiwan has extended its partnership with Vieshow Cinemas to offer a new paperless or QR code ticketing service. With the new service, clients who book tickets using Citi credit cards on their smartphones will be able to enter cinema halls directly, without having to queue up to collect their movie tickets.
tag-3: When a client purchases tickets using a smartphone, a set of QR codes will automatically be generated and stored onto the client's mobile phone. Clients can then enter cinema halls by simply 'scanning' in the codes on their mobile phones.
tag-4: "This new service provides clients with an enhanced movie-going experience. Responding to changing customer behavior and the proliferation of mobile commerce, Citibank Taiwan intends to be at the forefront of introducing innovative products and services," said Vera Chang, Citibank Taiwan Head of Direct Banking & Business Development and Alliance.
tag-5: According to a report in August released by Google and Ipsos MediaCT on smartphone buying behavior, 37 percent of Taiwan's smartphone users have made a purchase using their phones with 15.6 percent of all purchases for buying tickets - the highest proportion among various product categories studied. These figures show that the growth of mobile commerce via smartphones is on an upward trajectory.
tag-6: In addition to the new QR ticketing system, Citibank Taiwan has introduced new promotions, including a buy-one-get-one-free benefit on weekday tickets and a 17 percent discount on weekend tickets for Citi Privilege Cardholders across Vieshow's 11 cinema locations in Taiwan. Other discounts have also been available on the bank's other credit cards.
tag-7: Building on its mobile phone offerings, Citibank Taiwan first forged a partnership with Vieshow Cinema last year, making the latter's website accessible to clients via their smartphones for ease of purchasing tickets. Discounts were also made available via Citi Mobile.
tag-8: Moving forward, the Bank will be looking to add a wide variety of privileges and benefits on dining and accommodation on the new QR code ticketing service.
